channel.title: 508 server GENDERS?

item.title: 508 server GENDERS?
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

[quote=“0wn3r k4t3, post:2, topic:324166”]try these

[code]
} else if(cmd[0].equals(“female”)) {
p.look[0] = 48; // Hair
p.look[1] = 1000; // Beard
p.look[2] = 57; // Torso
p.look[3] = 64; // Arms
p.look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
p.look[5] = 77; // Legs
p.look[6] = 80; // Shoes
p.gender = 1;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“male”)) {
p.look[0] = 5;
p.look[1] = 14;
p.look[2] = 18;
p.look[3] = 27;
p.look[4] = 33;
p.look[5] = 87;
p.look[6] = 42;
p.gender = 0;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;
[/code][/quote]

Worked like a charm, had no problem compiling. Plus it works

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server GENDERS?
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

Hey, I am running a server that is based off of Berky-Scape, everything is fine and nice job Berky …
but the only problem is changing a male to a female or the other way around… there are no gender changing commands that I found… I went into login.java and put this if (p.username.equals("rsxcy godess")) { p.rights = 2; p.gender = 1;

So… I don’t even know if a gender is programmed into there or what to do…

Read full topic
